pages.title: Black & White Tarantula
pages.text: Nhandu coloratovillosus also known as the Brazilian black & white tarantula or the bombardier tarantula, is a species of tarantula first described by Günter Schmidt in 1998.$(br2)They are found in the grasslands of Brazil and Paraguay, and are terrestrial tarantulas.

pages.title: Black & White Tarantula
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:chicken$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
